section.p: This class represents the abstract base class for all the questions contained in the assessment questionnaire.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] question with data type Code
The question in a questionnaire (e.g. Assessment instrument) may be based on a common value set. Therefore, the question may be a coded attribute.

Contains exactly one [1..1] question with data type Code
The question in a questionnaire (e.g. Assessment instrument) may be based on a common value set. Therefore, the question may be a coded attribute.
